title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Aug 3 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Aug 3 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2: Clay and Buck join Governor Cuomo’s press conference in progress. Cuomo puts on a masterclass in denial, claims he didn’t harass anyone. In his preplanned remarks, Buck says Cuomo shows a "smooch collage." Buck remains convinced Cuomo will never go. Clay thinks he may resign. Flashback: Biden said Cuomo should be prosecuted if allegations are true. Is #MeToo dead? 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
